title: Content Telemetry Tags
description: Tags associated with assests, webelement or webpages for Content Telemetry

telemetry:manualTags.title: Manual Tags

items.title: Tag
items.description: The list of manually assigned tags for the item

telemetry:manualTags.description: The `manualTags` property is used to track human-assigned descriptive phrases like keywords or tags of an item.

telemetry:predictedTags.title: Predicted Tags

items.title: Predicted tag
items.description: The `Predicted tag` schema describes a tag in a list of tags, with specific importance relative to other tags in the same list.

value.title: Tag value
value.description: The tag itself. A short description of the content of the element.

dc:language.description: Language of the keyword. The locale code should follow [RFC BCP 47](https://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

confidence.title: Confidence score
confidence.description: The confidence score of the predicted tag on a scale from zero to one.

telemetry:predictedTags.description: The `predictedTags` property is used to track machine-generated tags of items.
